  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109708</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109708</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Phases of waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phasen der Wellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Phases des vagues</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fases das ondas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fasi delle onde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάσεις κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fases de ondas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows two waves of different wavelengths having regions where both are in phase or out of phase with each other.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">in phase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">out of phase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt zwei Wellen der 
unterschiedlichen Wellenlängen, die Regionen haben, in denen beide in
der Phase oder aus Phase mit einander heraus sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre deux vagues de 
différentes longueurs d'onde ayant des régions où toutes les deux 
ont lieu dans la phase ou hors de phase avec l'un l'autre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra duas ondas dos 
wavelengths diferentes que têm as regiões onde ambos se realizam na 
fase ou fora da fase com se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra due onde delle 
lunghezze d'onda differenti che hanno regioni dove entrambe hanno 
luogo nella fase o dalla fase con a vicenda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δύο κύματα των 
διαφορετικών μηκών κύματος που έχουν τις περιοχές όπου και οι 
δύο είναι στη φάση ή από τη φάση η μια με την άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra dos ondas de diversas 
longitudes de onda que tienen regiones donde están ambas en fase o 
fuera de fase con uno a.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">in der Phase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aus Phase heraus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phasen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlängen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dans la phase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hors de la phase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueurs d'onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vagues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">na fase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fora da fase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nella fase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dalla fase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fasi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lunghezze d'onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στη φάση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">από τη φάση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φάσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">longitudes de onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas</string>
          </keyword>
